title: Southern Germany hit by catastrophic flooding
description: The southern states of Bavaria and Baden-Württemberg have been inundated, causing dam bursts and prompting dramatic rescues. States of emergency have been declared in several areas with more heavy rain in the forecast.
content:
Residents in the southern Germany states of Bavaria and Baden Württemberg have been urged to be careful, with some even being evacuated, amid ongoing storms.

title: Germany floods: Firefighter dies during rescue in Bavaria
description: A firefighter was killed when the rubber dinghy he was riding on capsized during severe flooding, and at least one person is missing in south Germany as the region braces for more rainstorms. DW has the latest.
